## Remarks The method specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeEventHandler> delegate will be called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged> event is raised.
Page developers can provide custom handlers for Web Part events by adding an `OnDisplayModeChanged` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute. A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically. For more information about how to subscribe to an event, see [How to: Raise and Consume Events](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-raise-and-consume-events.md).
